maqras.text: Yiqian, wo que yi ci gei yi bu la xin zhengdao [yisilan jiao], wo shi shen zhi ta [duxin wo] de.
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zuren shuo:“Nimen suo gongfeng de zhexie suxiang shi shenme?”
Tamen shuo:“Women faxian women de zuxian yeshi [zheyang] chongbai tamen de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen he nimen de zuxian que shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong.”
Tamen shuo:“Ni dui women jiang de shi zhen hua, haishi kaiwanxiao?”
Ta shuo:“Bu, nimen de zhu shi chuangzao tiandi de zhu [an la], wo neng wei ci zuozheng.
Yi an la fashi! Nimen zhuanshen likai hou, wo yiding yao yong jimou cuihui nimen de ouxiang.”
Ranhou, ta ba naxie ouxiang dou da suile, zhi gei tamen liu xia zuida de yige, yibian tamen huilai wen ta.
Tamen shuo:“Shei dui women de shenling zuole zhe jian shi? Shei que shi bu yi zhe.”
Tamen shuo:“Women ting shuo you ge jiao yi bu la xin de qingnian ceng feibangguo tamen.”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen ba ta dai dao zhongren mianqian lai, yibian tamen zuozheng.”
Tamen shuo:“Yi bu la xin a! Shi ni dui women de shenling zuole zhe jian shi ma?”
Ta shuo:“Bu, shi tamen zhong zuida di nage ouxiang zuo de. Nimen wen wen tamen ba! Jiaru tamen hui jianghua.”
Yushi tamen jiu huxiang menxinziwen. Tamen shuo:“Nimen [chongbai ouxiang] dique zuo cuole.”
Ranhou, tamen jinghuang shicuo [shuo]:“Ni dique zhidao zhexie ouxiang shi bu hui jianghua de.”
Ta shuo:“Nandao nimen hai yao she an la er chongbai dui nimen ji wuyi ye wu hai de ouxiang ma?
Pei! Nimen bu gai she an la er chongbai zhexie ouxiang! Nandao nimen buming li ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Jiaru nimen xiang zuo, nimen jiu shao si [zhu] ta ba! Nimen ti nimen de shenling baochou ba!”
Wo [an la] shuo:“Huo a! Ni wei yi bu la xin bian liangshuang he anquan ba!”
Tamen xiang mouhai ta, er wo que shi tamen chengwei zui sunshi de.
Wo zhengjiule ta he lu te, bing shi ta lia dao wo ceng wei zhong shijie ci fu di difang qu.
Wo shangci ta [yige er zi] yi si ha ge, you jia ci ta [yige sunzi] ya gubu, wo shi tamen dou chengwei shanren.

Wo shi tamen chengwei [renlei de] lingxiu, tamen feng wo de mingling yindao [renlei] zunxing zhengdao. Wo qishi tamen:[Tamen] dangxingshangong, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, zhi neng chongbai wo.
Wo ciyu lu te zhihui he [zongjiao] zhishi, wo zhengjiu ta tuolile zuo huaishi de chengshi [de renmin], nage chengshi de renmin que shi yi huo beini de e min.
Wo shi ta [lu te] jinru wo de enhui zhong, ta que shi yi wei shanren.
[Wo ci tongyang de enhui gei] nu ha. Ciqian, ta ceng [gao sheng] qiqiu wo, wo dayingle ta [de qiqiu], wo zhengjiu ta he ta de jiaren tuolile da nan.
Wo yuanzhu ta diyu fouren wo de jixiang de minzhong. Tamen que shi yi huo e min, suoyi, wo ba tamen dou yan sile.
[Wo ci tongyang de enhui gei] da wude he su lai man. Dang youxie zuren de yang qun yejian jinru tiandi chi zhuangjia shi, ta lia wei ci panjue, wo [an la] jianzhengle tamen suo panjue de.
Wo shi su lai man zhidao ruhe panjue, wo ci gei ta lia zhihui he zhishi. Wo shi qun shan he zhong niao sui da wude [zhu] yiqi zansong wo. Zhexie shi dou shi wo zuo de.
Wo jiaoshou ta [su lai man] wei nimen zhizao kaijia, yibian zai zhandou zhong baohu nimen. Nimen hui gan'en ma [zhu]?
[Wo] shi baofeng wei su lai man fuwu, ta feng ta de mingling chui xiang wo cengcifu di difang. Wo shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.
[Wo hai shi jingling zhong de] yixie emo [wei su lai man fuwu], tamen ti ta qianshui, ye zuo qita gongzuo. Wo zai jiandu tamen.
